mapper.insert: insert into FJ_COMP values( #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ceo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comp_part, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capital, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incharge, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comp_reg_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_sale}, #{emp_count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{like_count}, #{reg_date}, #{last_date} )
mapper.update: update FJ_COMP set ceo = #{ceo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_part = #{comp_part, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zipcode = #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capital = #{capital, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_type = #{comp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incharge = #{incharge, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_reg_date = #{comp_reg_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_sale = #{year_sale}, emp_count = #{emp_count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_date = #{last_date} where email = #{email}
